login.title: LOGIN
login.subtitle:
Enter your username and password
to sign in your account

signup.title: Create Account
signup.subtitle:
Fill in the details below to create
your new account
signup.verifySubtitle:
Enter the 6-digit code sent to your email
to verify your account.

username.minLength: Username must be at least 3 characters
username.pattern: Username can only contain letters, numbers, dots, hyphens, and underscores

email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address

password.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
password.pattern: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character.

firstName.minLength: First name must be at least 2 characters
firstName.maxLength: First name must not exceed 50 characters
firstName.pattern: First name can only contain letters, spaces, apostrophes, and hyphens

lastName.minLength: Last name must be at least 2 characters
lastName.maxLength: Last name must not exceed 50 characters
lastName.pattern: Last name can only contain letters, spaces, apostrophes, and hyphens

phoneNumber.minLength: Phone number must be at least 8 digits
phoneNumber.maxLength: Phone number must not exceed 15 digits
phoneNumber.pattern: Phone number can only contain digits

verificationCode.length: Verification code must be exactly 6 digits
verificationCode.pattern: Verification code must contain only digits

newPassword.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
newPassword.pattern: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.subtitle:
Enter your email address and we'll send you
a code to reset your password
forgotPassword.resetSubtitle:
Enter the 6-digit code sent to your email
and create a new password
